body_html:
thanks. But, I going to take a lot of time deep learning model. :( do you now another way ? Would it be troublesome set up the two together ? well both GPU and CPU , do you now? 2018-06-27 0:47 GMT+03:00 Cevat Bostancıoğlu <notifications@github.com>:
…
Hi, https://www.quora.com/Does-CUDA-work-on-AMD-GPUs You should use cpu mode i believe. — You are receiving this because you authored the thread.
